scripts.start:server: node scripts/waitForKafka.js server-service && cd server-service && npm start
scripts.start:bot: node scripts/waitForKafka.js bot-service && cd bot-service && npm start
scripts.start:wholeBackend: concurrently -n SERVRE,BOT -c cyan,magenta "npm run start:server" " npm run start:bot"
scripts.start: concurrently -n SERVER,FRONTEND,BOT -c yellow,cyan,magenta "npm run start:server" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:bot"
scripts.debug: concurrently -n SERVER,FRONTEND,BOT -c yellow,cyan,magenta "npm run debug:server" "npm run debug:frontend" "npm run debug:bot"
scripts.preinstall: npm run install:server && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:bot
